text: Suspiria is a 1977 Italian horror movie directed by Dario Argento and starring Jessica Harper, Stefania Casini, Flavio Bucci, Miguel Bos√©, Alida Valli, Udo Kier, Joan Bennett. It was distributed by Produzioni Atlas Consorziate. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 horror movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Movies directed by Dario Argento Category:Movies set in boarding schools Category:Movies set in Germany
